name: expert-lab-sprint-1
description: This project is a simple static website built using **HTML** and **CSS**. The project utilizes a **CI/CD pipeline** that automatically builds a Docker image and pushes it to **Docker Hub** upon changes in the repository. Additionally, **Watchtower** is used to automatically update the running Docker container with the latest version of the website. The project has **unit tests** as well as **integration tests** to ensure the functionality of the web application.
